text: Waltrudis Buck is an actress and writer who resides in Manhattan. ==Education== Buck has an MFA in Fiction Writing from Hunter College and has studied acting with Lee Strasberg and Uta Hagen. ==Stage work== Buck starred in Amy Herzog’s Obie Award-winning drama 4000 Miles at the Frenetic Theater in March of 2014. * 4000 Miles (Vera) Vermont Stage Company, director: Michael dove * Driving Miss Daisy (Daisy) Playhouse On Park, West Hartford, Ct.
